exceptions.exn: In environment drop := fun n : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat -> list nat) (fun l : list nat => l) (fun (_ : nat) (Hrecn : list nat -> list nat) (l : list nat) => Hrecn match l with | nil => nil | _ :: l0 => l0 end) n : nat -> list nat -> list nat n : nat Unable to unify "nth n nil 0" with "codeNth n (codeList nil)".

original: intros n l. induction l as [| h t IHl]. - reflexivity. - simpl. unfold codeNth. simpl. rewrite <- IHl. reflexivity.
